BOOK NOW
ABOUT US
Offering an Ideal Beach Getaway for Everyone!
Experience the Charm of Fort Walton Beach
Fort Walton Beach, nestled in Okaloosa County, Florida, offers a unique blend of small-town charm and urban convenience. Surrounded by the scenic Santa Rosa Sound, Choctawhatchee Bay, and Cinco Bayou, this seaside community boasts a rich history and vibrant neighborhoods. Founded in 1937, Fort Walton Beach retains its welcoming, small-town feel while offering modern amenities.
The area’s history stretches back 14,000 years, with Native American roots and early settlers arriving shortly after Florida became a U.S. territory in 1821. The Walton Guards established Camp Walton in 1861, named in honor of Colonel George Walton, then acting governor of Florida. In 1868, John T. Brooks acquired land that now forms part of downtown Fort Walton Beach. The city’s growth was significantly boosted by the establishment of Eglin Air Force Base in 1937, which remains a key part of the community today.
Book  a stay Now!
FORT WALTON BEACH RV PARK
Fort Walton Beach RV Park is a brand-new, clean, family-friendly, pet-friendly, and wheelchair-friendly RV Park located in the heart of Fort Walton Beach, Florida. We aim to ensure a safe and delightful experience for guests visiting our park. Our RV Park has multiple safety measures designed to bring comfort and relaxation. We hope you enjoy the amenities and features FWB RV Park has to offer at a very affordable price.
Our Park Rules
Welcome to Fort Walton Beach RV Park, your new favorite family-friendly destination just minutes from the beautiful Emerald Coast beaches. To ensure a pleasant and enjoyable stay for everyone, please review our park rules before booking and upon arrival. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to providing you with a fantastic experience!
Read more
Frequently Asked Question
What are your office hours?
Our office hours are 8AM-5PM. However, we are always available and just a phone call or text message away. You can reach us at 850-822-3212.
How many spaces does the park have?
At FWB RV Park, there are 26 spots available. We have a total of 15 back in pads as well as 11 pull through pads.
Are there restaurants nearby?
Yes, there are many delicious, locally owned and operated restaurants in the area. There are many great chains as well to accommodate everyone’s taste! We have compiled a list of
Places to Eat
while you visit the area here!
Are pets allowed at FWB RV Park LLC?
Yes, we allow pets at FWB RV Park. Please note that FWB RV Park LLC, its owners, management or representatives are not and will not be held responsible or liable for any bodily injury, property damage or medical payments to others, caused by any animal whether owned or not owned by tenants or guests.
Are tent sites available?
Tent camping is not permitted at FWB RV Park.
What time is check-in / check-out?
Check-in is at
2:00 PM
, and check-out is at
11:00 AM
. If you need early check-in or late check-out, please contact the office in advance, and we’ll do our best to accommodate your request.
Does FWB RV Park offer in-park WiFi and Cable?
We only offer Wi-Fi, no cable.
Is the park open year-round?
Yes, FWB RV Park is open year-round.
When are quiet hours at the park?
Quiet hours are from
10:00 PM
to
7:00 AM
. Please be respectful of other guests by keeping noise levels down during these hours.
How long are your RV Sites?
All of our RV sites are between 60 feet and 75 feet long. Check out this diagram of our RV Park!
Where is the nearest hospital?
Fort Walton Beach Medical Center is located at 1000 Mar Walt Dr, Fort Walton Beach, FL 32547
What types of RV sites are available?
We offer both pull-through and back-in sites to accommodate various RV preferences. Each site ranges from 60 to 75 feet in length, providing ample space for different RV sizes. All sites are equipped with full hookups, including electricity, water, and sewage connections. Additionally, each site features a large concrete pad with a picnic table for your outdoor enjoyment.
What amenities are provided at each RV site?
Each of our 26 RV sites includes:
Full Hookups: Electricity (50/30/20 amp), water, and sewage connections.
Large Concrete Pads: Ensuring a level and clean surface for your RV.
Picnic Tables: Available at every site for outdoor dining and relaxation.
Lighted Pedestals: For added safety and convenience during your stay.
Are the roads within the park paved?
Yes, our park features paved roads, ensuring easy navigation and a smooth driving experience for all guests.
How many vehicles are included with my RV site?
Each RV site includes parking for one (1) vehicle. This helps us maintain a safe and spacious environment for all guests.
Can I bring an extra vehicle or boat?
Yes! We offer additional parking for $10 per day. This includes cars, trucks, trailers, or boats. Space is limited, so please let us know in advance if you’ll need extra parking.
How do I reserve additional parking?
Simply mention it when you make your reservation, or contact us ahead of time to add it to your stay. We’ll confirm availability and make sure a spot is ready for you.
What happens if I show up with more vehicles than allowed without booking in advance?
We’ll do our best to accommodate, but parking is limited. Unregistered extra vehicles may be turned away or subject to the $10/day charge if space is available.

Each RV site includes parking for one (1) vehicle. This helps us maintain a safe and spacious environment for all guests.
Can I bring an extra vehicle or boat?
Yes! We offer additional parking for $10 per day. This includes cars, trucks, trailers, or boats. Space is limited, so please let us know in advance if you’ll need extra parking.
How do I reserve additional parking?
Simply mention it when you make your reservation, or contact us ahead of time to add it to your stay. We’ll confirm availability and make sure a spot is ready for you.
What happens if I show up with more vehicles than allowed without booking in advance?
We’ll do our best to accommodate, but parking is limited. Unregistered extra vehicles may be turned away or subject to the $10/day charge if space is available.
